"But how can you measure success for DX?" is something I get asked often. As VP of DX at @Netlify, @sarah_edo has given this some proper thought, and talks about our OKRs and a whole lot more in this article about the Developer Experience org at @Netlify. https://t.co/8DIzO2GC6I
